prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just wanted to check in and see how your day is going.  
Reminder: Your dentist appointment is tomorrow at 3 PM.  
Thanks for your order! It will arrive by Friday.  
Can we reschedule our meeting to next Tuesday?  
Just got back from the grocery store. Need anything?  
Your bank alert: $50 was withdrawn from your account today.  
Looking forward to the party this weekend! Let me know if you need help.  
You have a new message from your coworker. Check it out when you can!  
Hey, can you pick up some milk on your way home?  
Your subscription will renew on the 15th.  
Just wanted to say I’m thinking of you. Hope all is well!  
Meeting confirmation: Project review on Thursday at 10 AM.  
Your OTP is 123456. Please enter it to verify your login.  
Let’s catch up soon! It’s been too long.  
Reminder: The community cleanup event is on Saturday at 9 AM.  
I finished the report and sent it your way.  
Please confirm your attendance for the dinner next week.  
Your package has been shipped and is on the way!  
I’ll be late; traffic is a mess.  
Thanks for a great meeting today!  
Quick question: Are we still on for lunch tomorrow?  
Your flight to New York is confirmed for next Monday.  
Just checking in to see how your mom is doing.  
Your appointment with the financial advisor is set for next Thursday.  
Could you send me the link to the document we discussed?  
Your payment was processed successfully.  
Hey! What time do you want to meet for dinner?  
Just a reminder, the deadline for submissions is this Friday.  
Hope you have a great weekend! Let’s touch base next week.  
Your order is ready for pickup at the store.  
Please let me know if you received the files I sent.  
Looking forward to seeing you at the family reunion!  
Your account will be upgraded to premium on the 20th.  
Let’s reschedule our coffee date for next week instead.  
I saw your message; I’ll get back to you shortly.  
Your reservation at the restaurant is confirmed for 7 PM.  
Thanks for volunteering! We appreciate your help.  
Just checking if you got my last text.  
Your loan application has been approved!  
Let’s finalize the details for the presentation soon.  
I’m at the café; let me know when you arrive.  
Your feedback is valuable; please complete the survey.  
I’m here if you need to talk about anything.  
The event was a success! Thanks for all your hard work.  
Your membership will expire soon; please renew.  
Just a quick reminder to submit your timesheet by Friday.  
I’ll be on vacation next week; can we touch base before then?  
Your device has been successfully updated.  
Hope you’re enjoying the new book! Let’s discuss soon.  
I’m really proud of you for completing that project!  
Please confirm if you’re able to attend the webinar tomorrow.  
Your invoice is now available for review in your account.  
I’m thinking about going hiking this weekend; want to join?  
Just checking in to see if you need anything.  
Thanks for your patience while we resolve the issue.  
Don’t forget to bring your ID to the meeting on Wednesday.
